---
<!-- we make the data here -->

.left-column[
# Get the data
]

.right-column[

```{r filterdata}
# getting the data
namedata <- babynames %>%
  filter(name == params$name1 | 
           name == params$name2) %>% 
  filter(sex == "F") 

glimpse(namedata) #<<
```
]
---

<!-- get and see top years for each name -->

.left-column[
# Tables
]

.right-column[

```{r gettopyears}
topyears <- namedata %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  top_n(1, prop) 
```


```{r topyear-name1}
topyears %>% 
  filter(name == params$name1) %>%
  gt() #<<
```


```{r topyear-name2}
topyears %>% 
  filter(name == params$name2) %>%
  knitr::kable(format = "html") #<<
```

]

---

<!-- plot name popularity over time -->

.left-column[
# Chart
]

.right-column[

```{r, highlight.output = c(1, 2), fig.retina = 3}
ggplot(namedata, 
  aes(x = year, 
      y = prop,  
      group = name, 
      color = name)) + 
  geom_line() 
```

]
